content: Known for his distinctive voice and narrative songwriting, this American singer-songwriter released the critically acclaimed album "Born to Run" in 1975.

I think the singer you're referring to is Bruce Springsteen. He's a legendary figure in American music, known for his powerful voice and storytelling through his songs. "Born to Run" is indeed one of his most famous albums, which catapulted him to stardom. The album is filled with energetic rock tracks that capture the spirit of rebellion and the pursuit of the American dream. Springsteen's ability to connect with audiences through his music has made him an icon in the industry.
